description: Information about City's authorized spending limit, contract lifetime (called inception-to-date) ordering and spending.  Contracts are visible only while active.  For the purposes of the Online Contract Catalog Flat File, a contract is a long-term (multi-year) contract for goods and services, and contracts for Construction activity. Within the City, these are referred to as Master Agreements and Central Purchase Contracts.

name: Contract Catalog
